idea:
DSW Website


DSW is a visionary tech start-up founded in 2019, headquartered in Mumbai, India. We are a passionate team of individuals, collectively bringing extensive knowledge and experience in Enterprise Architecture, software development, data science, and open-source space with expertise across industry and technology solutions. By leveraging Artificial Intelligence, our data-driven products, platform solutions, and services enable enterprises and communities alike, making AI available for everyone.


Our goal is to empower customers with our ethical artificial intelligence-based solutions to help them achieve their business goals by harnessing their data. Our consultancy on data management and data engineering enables customers to make the best use of their data to boost business outcomes.


Our solutions are best-fit for BFSI, Telcos, Healthcare, and more; and teamed with our intelligent platform solutions we add AI capabilities to DevOps, IT Ops - helping align IT business transactions to business objectives.
name: DATA SCIENCE WIZARDS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
About Sanskriitii

Sanskriitii ‚Äì an initiative that not only embodies its literal meaning but has also become our mission and way of life. Sanskriitii Crafts Studio is the entrepreneurial venture of two industry veterans with a dream of giving back to the society and restore the cultural heritage that India is always known for.

Brain child of Mr. Anil Tripathi (25+ years of industry experience) and Ms. Lata Pathak with 16+ years of industry experience and an alumni of INSEAD, at Sanskriitii, we are into curating handmade and fusion artifacts for Corporates & Hotel interiors. We act as an interface between the talented artisans of India and the large Institutions and have a vision of empowering Indian handicrafts & small-scale women entrepreneurs and craftsmen working in the field of art and craft.

Our mission at Sanskriitii is to work towards:-

a) Saving the environment and Mother Earth

b) Build an ecosystem to support Indian Heritage & crafts.

Our first mission, we are aggressively contributing towards our Mother Earth, we are promoting products made out of ‚ÄúWheatstraw‚Äù to various hotels with intend to replace the single use plastic products like toiletries. We are also in the process of manufacturing our own skin essential range for the Hotel Industry. These products are completely paraben and SLS free. So that when these products reach to our oceans they don‚Äôt hurt the life there by turning the water toxic. On this journey we are closely working with elite institution like Nabard.

In our second mission, we build an ecosystem to support crafts which are on the verge of dying in India or have received little appreciation for these crafts. As a result, artisans attached to these crafts are pushed to take other miscellaneous jobs in town outside their villages to survive and earn livelihood for their family and themselves. Two primary bottlenecks we experienced after years of collaboration with these artisans directly are

a) New designs based on today‚Äôs market demand and taste.

b) Monetary constraints for the artisans to pull off large orders

In both the above mentioned bottleneck, Sanskriitii plays a vital role. We have in-house designers and we interact closely with industry stalwarts and take this intellect back to the artisans. We support our artisans with capital and raw material. And build entire ecosystem around them to enable that we delivery of this beautiful artefacts to our corporate clients.

At Sanskriitii, we are into curating handmade and fusion artefacts for corporate gifting and Hotels interiors & supplies.

Sharing our latest catalogue

http://online.fliphtml5.com/rselv/etdf/?1526997741707

We are fortunate to get some coverage on online media:

Sakal: http://www.sakaltimes.com/art-culture/crafting-culture-39416?amp

Startup Stories: https://www.startupstories.in/stories/inspirational-stories/sanskriitii-a-saviour-for-indian-artisans
name: Sanskriitii Crafts

idea:
Dotcom IoT Founded in 2019, dotcom Technologies LLP headquarter in Surat. We‚Äôre one of the leading Software, Firmware, and IOT Hardware Solution Provider Company in India.

(a) We‚Äôre a team of Designers, Developers, Makers, and Researchers who are passionate about Innovation and Product Design Services for our clients.

For the last 5 years, we have been delivering end to end IOT solutions from concept to the manufacturing that can enhance the potential in a rapidly competitive environment.

(b) Our cutting edge services include rapid Product Prototyping, POC, Market Research, Technology Identification, Product Engineering, Product Re-Engineering, OEM, etc.

(c) We have the ability to take up design and development at any stage of the product development life cycle such as defining, designing, verifying or realizing the product.

(d) We diligently work with our customers until we match the higher level of customer expectation.

(e) We believe in long-term mutual relations with our customers that can help us to deliver what really matters and which makes the world a better and smarter.

Products / Services : Dotcom IoT Website Dotcom IoT IoT Based Smart Innovative Products List :

(1) Prkruti - Outdoor Air Quality Monitor;
(2) Prkruti Lite - World's Smallest Indoor Air Monitor;
(3) Smart Parking - LoRaWAN Smart Parking Nodes;
(4) Smart Cylinder Lock - Use your smartphone to lock & unlock the door;
(5) Smart Fan Multipurpose Controller - You don't have to stand up every time to operate your fan, now you can operate from anywhere all over the world;
(6) Smart Air Water Cooler - Stay cool in hot summer;
(7) Smart Oxygen Management System - Now work in healthy environment; (8) 6LoWPAN Smart Home Automation - Smart home appliances make an easy life;
(9) Car Security System - Stolen car key? Don't worry, they can't start without your permission;
(10) IOT QR Code Reader - QR code reader for gift-cards, tickets & access points;
(11) NB-IoT Tracking System - Everything can be track;
(12) KoDo - Offline entertainment on the go;
(13) OpenCV Passenger Counting System - Keeping the passenger record live;
(14) NFC Mini Reader - Short-range NFC reader for read/write information; (15) NFC LED Tag - Now it's easy to find specific tags from a bulk inventory of packets laying of NFC reader;
(16) NFC Smart Certificate - Now it's easy to authenticate the certificates or any documents with NFC;
(17) NFC Access Control - Now it's easy to control door lock with NFC;
(18) Education Based on Smart Learning - Transforming digital education with AR;
(19) Jewelry Rendering - Now you can try every jewelry & buy only the jewelry which suits on you;
(20) 3D Hologram - Diamond is very precious although you can see it in real-time;
(21) Chat Bot- Build your own chat bot;

Dotcom IoT Services : Dotcom Technologies LLP is the part of the D&K group and it is the leading Software Solution Company based in Surat, India.

We strongly believe and follow the agile SDLC (Software Development Life Cycle) steps for the rapid product prototyping and fast reach to the market. We are offering the services like Firmware Design, Custom Hardware Design, Cloud Solution, ODM (Original Design Manufacturing), OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturing), Smartphone Application Development, Web Design, UI/UX Design, etc. 

We also have individual QA team to ensure the quality of the product for the long run that can use in any environment.
name: DOTCOMIOT LLP

idea: Peacock solar aims to be India's first residential energy partner for independent homes housing middle, lower middle income families in Tier 2 and 3 cities. By offering finance for credit worthy households, Peacock accelerates adoption of residential rooftop solar and allows homeowners to save resources and sustainably add appliances to upgrade their family's lifestyle. Beginning with 50 million Indian urban homeowners, Peacock wishes to serve middle-income/lower middle-income households across the world with easy access to solar and the energy efficient appliances. This solution can potentially eliminate the need for coal-fired pollution, inefficient transmission system and the resultant pollution thereof.
name: SANGAM SMESCO PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Love the world today (LTWT) is a mindful clothing brand for children aged 0-8 years. Not only are we a great alternative for children's clothing but also at the same time, we are ensuring that we are leaving a lesser carbon footprint from our chosen skin. We use 'clothes' as a medium to have conversations with people around mindful consumption and responsible buying. Our endeveaur with LTWT is to change mindsets and consumer behaviour. We hope to create a mindful generation that is sensitive towards people, processes and environment. We work with organic cottons or handwoven textiles made by artisans across the country. Our dyes are herbal and low impact on the environment. We work with ethical practices and ensure our workers are paid and treated well. Our packaging is made from upcycled hotel table linen - All this while caring for everyone and everything involved in the process. One saying that always stayed with us, ‚ÄòWe may not live to see the future but our children will!‚Äô And that leaves us with no choice, but a sustainable way of life. LTWT is recognised as one of the pioneering and leading brand in this space. We have won awards three times in a row (Best Environmentally conscious from Kidstoppress, a leading parenting portal. We have also one the Times She Unltd Award in 2019 in the Fashion Category.
name: Love the world today
